name: UIColorPickerViewController
desc: A view controller that informs your app about user interaction with the color picker.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a color picker view controller.

items.name: var delegate: UIColorPickerViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: A view controller that handles the delegate actions.

items.name: var selectedColor: UIColor
items.desc: The color selected by the user.

items.name: var supportsAlpha: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that enables alpha value control.
